Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze

Class Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.Maze
  • public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the map used in the game for each level.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Maze​(int levelNumber, java.awt.Point chapLocation, java.awt.Point exitLocation, int treasuresNum, int timeAvailable, Tile[][] board, java.util.List<NPC> npcs)
      Constructs the level for the game based from the level data files.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Maze

        public Maze​(int levelNumber,
            java.awt.Point chapLocation,
            java.awt.Point exitLocation,
            int treasuresNum,
            int timeAvailable,
            Tile[][] board,
            java.util.List<NPC> npcs)
     throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
            java.io.IOException
        Constructs the level for the game based from the level data files.
        Parameters:
        chapLocation - The initial location of Chap.
        exitLocation - The location of the exit in the level.
        treasuresNum - Number of treasures in the level.
        board - The 2d array that represents the board for the level.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If chap is being set onto an inaccessible tile, then there is something wrong with the level.
        java.io.IOException
